summary:
Have you ever been in trouble as you used up recovery medicine during your journey?
Let's pray that you can meet him at such time, wandering merchant "Mr. White".
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89720/89720-1519123201-56085260.png[/img]

He is a merchant traveling all over Skyrim, he may continue to keep moving in one place,
so you may find it difficult to find him.
Using MOD marking NPC will alleviate this difficulty.

or,Since his departure point is near the gate of Riften,
you can meet him as soon as you ambush before entering MOD.

He looks horribly seeming at first sight,
but he always keeps smiling always He will make peace of your party air, surely!

[size=5]Requirements:[/size]
The latest version of Skyrim.
and Latest Update.

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO[/url]﻿
He will work as a merchant without using this MOD,
but he seems not to be a friend from the problem of voice setting.
(Changing his voice will solve the problem but I like the voice of Belethor so I decided to keep it as it is)

[size=5]Combat:[/size]
Continue to escape, and sometimes summon guards

[size=5]Change Log:[/size]
ver.1.0
I made it by the impulse,
but he is neither pretty nor cool, he is just a scary face uncle,
so I can not motivate the production, please help me.

ver.1.1
"Mr. White's flour" was added to the sale

[size=5]Credit:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS by [b]xp32[/b][/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563]Wet and Cold - by [size=2]isoku[color=#ffffff]  ~[/color][/size][/url] used backpacks﻿
and Skyrim by Bethesda

I learned how to set up AI Package at "UNI san" site "[url=http://skyrimeasy.blog-rpg.com/top%20page]houkouonchi no skyrim[/url]",
I would have been at a loss if I did not meet this site.

I am grateful to all the above people!
author: moriposn
